status._21: Invalid transType or service not allowed
status._51: Invalid transNum or unavailable to act on transNum due to funding
status._53: A ProPay account with this e
status._54: A ProPay account with this social security number already exists
status._55: The email address provided does not correspond to a ProPay account.
status._56: Recipient’s e-mail address shouldn’t have a ProPay account and does
status._57: Cannot settle transaction because it already expired
status._58: Credit card declined (the responseCode element will provide info on the decline reason)
status._59: Invalid Credential or IP address not allowed
status._60: Credit card authorization timed out; retry at a later time
status._66: Denied a ProPay account (Developer should display a descriptive message that guides a new user to fill out ProPay exceptions form and submit it.)
status._69: Duplicate invoice number (The same card was charged for the same amount with the same invoice number (including blank invoices) in a 1 minute period. Details about the original transaction are included whenever a 69 response is returned. These details include a repeat of the auth code, the original AVS response, and the original CVV response.)
status._71: Account previously set up, but problem affiliating it with partner
status._72: The ProPay Account has already been upgraded to a Premium Account
status._76: Not Premium (used only for push/pull transactions)
status._97: Account created in documentary status, but still must be validated.
status._98: Account created in documentary status, but still must be validated and paid for.
status._99: Account created successfully, but still must be paid for.
status._103: Transaction does not meet date criteria
status._104: Transaction could not be refunded due to current transaction state.
status._109: Invalid value for require CC refund
status._110: Required field is missing (This is returned only for edit ProPay account. See response tag for field name.)
status._113: One of the business legal address fields is invalid
status._125: You may not transfer money between these two accounts. Sponsor bank transfer disallowed.
status._126: Currency code not allowed for this transaction
status._127: Currency code not permitted for this account
status._129: Multicurrency processing is not allowed for the account
status._130: Multicurrency processing is not supported for this bank processor
status._132: Account setup does not allow capture for amount greater than authorization
status._133: Threat Metrix risk denied (no responseCode is returned)
status._142: Invalid MCC Code (non-numeric or not in our database)

responseCode._4: Pick up Card and deny transaction
responseCode._6: Customer requested stop to recurring payment
responseCode._7: Customer requested stop to all recurring payments
responseCode._15: No such issuer. Could not route transaction
responseCode._19: re enter transaction or the merchant account may be boarded incorrectly
responseCode._57: Bank does not allow this type of purchase
responseCode._58: Credit card network does not allow t his type of purchase for your merchant account.
responseCode._62: Issuer does not allow this card to be charged for your business.
responseCode._85: Service not supported for this card
responseCode._93: Cannot complete transaction. Customer should call 800 number.
responseCode._97: Approved for a lesser amount. ProPay will not settle and consider this a decline.
responseCode._99: Unable to parse issuer response code. Generic decline

CVV2Resp._S: Merchant has indicated that CVV2 is not present on card
CVV2Resp._U: Issuer is not certified and/or has not provided Visa encryption keys

AVS._N: Zip code and Street do not match
